Key Match Events: Coby White made a go-ahead layup with 47 seconds left, giving the Bulls their first lead at 111-110.
Zach LaVine had 35 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists for Chicago.
Nikola Vucevic had 24 points and 11 boards.
White finished with 23 points and made a crucial dunk over Victor Wembanyama.
Wembanyama had 23 points, 14 rebounds, and eight blocks for San Antonio.
Chris Paul added 18 points and nine assists for the Spurs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago used an 11-0 run to trim San Antonio’s lead to 79-71 with 5:24 left in the third quarter.
San Antonio led 110-103 with 3:53 left, but Vucevic and LaVine each made a 3 to get Chicago within one with 2:38 to go.
Chicago went 5 for 8 from 3 in the fourth quarter, compared to 1 for 9 for San Antonio.
